I work in the Aviation Intelligence Unit of the European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (a.k.a. EUROCONTROL).

I love open source software and am grateful to all the ones contributing to it. I, too, try to participate a little with bug fixes, typo corrections, some code of my own or just appreciation.

Did I say I also love open data? No? Ok, so I love open data because I am convinced it is an instrument for citizens, and civil society to support democracy, i.e. transparency and accountability.
